View the
2026 Township Council Meeting Schedule (PDF)
.
Council Agendas, Minutes, Ordinances, and Resolutions can be found by visiting
IQM2 Intelligent Meeting Management
.
The township follows the requirements of
N.J.S.A 10:4-12
, the public comment portion of the Open Public Meetings Act, commonly known as the Sunshine Law.
This information is available to engage the public on the
Bloomfield Open Public Records page
.
Please see video versions of past meetings on
Bloomfield WBMA Television
.
